member.name: T:DocuWare.Services.Http.DeserializedHttpResponse`1
member.summary: Handles a deserialized HTTP response.
member.typeparam: The type of the encapsulated response.
member.remarks:
This class encapsulates a HTTP response. It contains the response headers and the deserialized body. Note that different values of causes different handling:
A will cause the HTTP response message content to be read as string.
A will cause the HTTP response message content to be read as . There might exceptions be thrown in case the response content is not a valid XML.
A will cause the HTTP response message content to be read as . The response content is read streaming, that is, you can consume arbitrary large streams. You should always call after you finished reading the stream in order to close the HTTP connection.
For any other values of the response content is deserialized into an intance of type . If the deserialization step fails, the throws exceptions.
All exceptions thrown while the response is deserialized, are wrapped into an object.
